column5: I would like to thank the crew from port weller(coast gaurd)officially.You guys did an exceptional job.I met one from the crew at brewers marine a few weeks later and thanked him personally for a job well done. You guys are tops,now if i can get a # to thank all,and some timmies to send. You guys are topnotch.
What did you do in order to require the services of the CG?  lol
Motor out of commission and no kicker.All other fisherman where darn blind to distress calls.
Been there done that, me with my little 15 foot boat ended up towing a much larger bassboat in cause all the big power boats that drove right pass me were deaf.

I remember my first boat, 14' runabout. Ran out of gas on my 1st trip.Paddled it, sat on the bow for about a mile.Waved at boats passing and they waved back, and kept going  I see nothing has changed over the years.BTW I have helped others over the years.
